name: Organic Bananas
description: Fresh organic bananas, sold by the pound. Rich in potassium and perfect for snacking or baking.

name: Whole Milk
description: 1 gallon of fresh whole milk, pasteurized and homogenized. Great source of calcium and vitamin D.

name: Whole Wheat Bread
description: Freshly baked whole wheat bread, perfect for sandwiches or toast. High in fiber and nutrients.

name: Chicken Breast
description: Boneless, skinless chicken breast. Sold by the pound. Lean protein source, great for grilling or baking.

name: Spinach
description: Fresh baby spinach, pre-washed and ready to eat. Packed with iron and vitamins.
